title: Find Commits that Manipulated a Specific String (Challenge)
description: Git is a powerful version control system that allows developers to track changes made to their codebase over time. One of the most useful features of Git is the ability to view the history of changes made to a specific file or even a specific line of code. In this challenge, you will learn how to use Git to find all the commits that manipulated a given string.

meta.title: Git Playground | Version Control | Commit Tracking
meta.description: Learn how to use Git, a powerful version control system, to track changes and find all the commits that modified a specific string in your codebase.
meta.keywords: Git, Version Control, Commit Tracking, Codebase, GitHub

steps.title: Find Commits that Manipulated a Specific String
